intro: Peperomia riocangrejalensis, commonly known as the Río Cangrejal peperomia, is a species native to Colombia. It is a compact, evergreen shrub with thick, fleshy leaves that are typically dark green and glossy. The plant produces small, inconspicuous white flowers that are borne on short, erect spikes. It thrives in bright, indirect light and prefers well-draining soil. Peperomia riocangrejalensis is well-suited for indoor cultivation due to its low maintenance requirements and ornamental foliage.
